labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Your keybind is set to RIGHT SHIFT + NUMBER
data.expected_result: Your keybind is set to LEFT SHIFT + NUMBER
data.short_description: The left shift will default to right shift when NUM lock is on while setting a keybind of [LEFT SHIFT+NUM KEY]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Keybinds - Add a Keybind - Select PTT - Click Record Keybind - Hold "LEFT SHIFT" and press any number on the NumPad with NumLock enabled.
